data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Retalhuleu, Guatemala.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Retalhuleu, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 28,137 people in the state of Retalhuleu who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 9,985 believers in the state of Retalhuleu into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Retalhuleu, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Retalhuleu, Guatemala.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: the state of Retalhuleu has (about) 9,985 people who know Jesus, 28,137 people who know about him culturally, and 1,878 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Retalhuleu, Guatemala.
